subject: ENGLISH
text: Write a composition of about three foolscap pages in length on any one of the following subjects :— A description of one of the following :—a general shop in a village ; a general store in a city ; a smiddy ; a garage ; an aerodrome ; a bus station ; a public library. Memories of a glorious summer (1955). The school subjects which you expect to be most useful to you. The advantages of joining a club, society, or other youth organization. Write as vividly as you can a story suggested by the following quotation :— "Hame cam his guid horse But never can he.”
